 We apply continuous selection, and the position may be filled before the last application date.
 



  





 DigitalRoute wants to be part of an inclusive and diverse environment and we are actively looking for qualified candidates irrespective of gender, sexual orientation, ethnicity, disability, or age. You will be part of a global and diverse company where our differences are our strengths.
 



  





 Apply now! We look forward to you joining us!

title: Senior Cloud Platform Specialist
description:
**Senior Cloud Platform Specialist to Swedish Space Corporation**
 Are there clouds in space? Do you like new technology and the opportunity to help influence and develop the future? Then maybe the role of Senior Cloud Specialist at SSC is something for you!
   

  

 SSC is now looking for a Senior Cloud Platform Specialist to join the global IT team. You are offered a challenging role in an exciting industry where you get a technical, hands-on role combined with Architectural design.
   

  

 At the Swedish Space Corporation (SSC), we are pioneering the future of space services and technology. Established in 1972, SSC provides comprehensive satellite communication, launch services, and cutting-edge space research from our globally recognized facilities, including the Esrange Space Center. Whether it's advancing scientific knowledge, supporting commercial satellite operations, or enhancing national security, SSC is your trusted partner in navigating the final frontier.
   

  

 Join us in pushing the boundaries of innovation and “Help Earth benefit from Space”!
   

  

**YOUR ROLE**
 The Senior Cloud Platform Specialist is a technical, hands-on role, with architectural responsibility, who is responsible for designing, implementing, and managing cloud-based infrastructure to ensure optimal performance, scalability, and security.
   

  

* Develop and implement cloud architecture that meet business requirements and optimize performance.
* Oversee the deployment, management, and maintenance of cloud infrastructure.
* Ensure cloud solutions comply with security standards and regulatory requirements, implementing robust security measures.
* Monitor and manage cloud costs, optimizing resource usage to achieve cost-efficiency.
* Provide advanced troubleshooting and technical support for cloud-related issues, ensuring minimal downtime.
* Maintain comprehensive documentation of cloud architecture, configurations, and procedures.
* Stay updated with the latest cloud technologies and best practices, recommending and implementing improvements.
* You will not only advance your expertise in cloud technologies but also take on the rewarding responsibility of mentoring and training colleagues across the organization.
* Your insights and knowledge will help elevate our team's overall proficiency, fostering a culture of continuous learning and innovation.
* Internal: Collaborate with IT teams, development teams, project managers, and business stakeholders.
* External: Work with cloud service providers, vendors, and consultants to implement and manage cloud solutions.


**Who You Are**
**Personal Characteristics**
* Ability to analyze complex problems and develop effective solutions.
* High level of accuracy and attention to detail in architectural design and implementation.
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills, in Swedish and English, with the ability to explain technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
* Collaborative mindset with the ability to work effectively in cross-functional teams.
* Flexibility to adapt to changing technologies and business needs.


**Knowledge**
* Minimum 3+ years of proven experience as a Cloud Platform Specialist or similar role in a high-tech industry.
* Architectural Skills, Strong understanding of cloud architecture principles. Deep expertise in cloud platforms such as AWS or Azure.
* Strong understanding of cloud security principles, identity management and compliance.
* Experience with infrastructure-as-code.
* Excellent problem-solving skills and a passion for continuous learning and improvement.
* Strong leadership skills and the ability to work collaboratively in a diverse and global team.
* DevOps, Knowledge of DevOps tools and methodologies, including CI/CD pipelines.
* Networking, good understanding of networking concepts and technologies related to cloud environments.
* Scripting and Automation, Proficiency in scripting languages (e.g., Python, PowerShell) and automation tools.


**Nice To Haves**
* Certifications in cloud technology on Solution Architect level or higher
* Knowledge of legacy concepts and migration paths
* Experience from working closely with software- developers and engineers.


**WE OFFER YOU**
* A great opportunity for professional development and advancement.
* An international workplace characterized by an open atmosphere and proud employees all over the world.
* Access to leading online learning platform for tech professionals.
* Attractive occupational pension (ITP) and tax exchange for pension.
* Wellness grant of 5,000 SEK/year
* In addition to 30 days’ vacation and traditional holidays, we have extra days off.
* To be part of creating the future of the Swedish and global space industry.


**Work Conditions**
* Environment: Office-based with the possibility of remote work.
* Travel: Occasional travel may be required for meetings, training, or conferences.
* Working Hours: Full-time position with standard working hours


**Swedish Citizenship is a requirement.**
**We are accepting applicants until 12th of August and applications will be reviewed after this date.**
**LOCATION**
 Solna Strand, Stockholm
   

  

**NEXT STEP**
 Are you interested in this challenging position within an international work environment in a successful company? Apply now! We evaluate all applications continuously. Please apply using your CV and personal letter by clicking the apply button below.
   

  

 The position requires a background control and security interview before employment.

title: Principal Engineer
description:
*Vill du arbeta i en modern och innovativ miljö där din tekniska expertis gör skillnad? Här finns möjligheten att bli en del av ett produktbolag i en spännande tillväxtresa!*
**Om tjänsten**
 Den här tjänsten är en direktrekrytering vilket innebär att rekryteringsprocessen sker genom Brillante och du anställs direkt hos Proposales.
   

  

  

  

**Om företaget**
 Proposales grundades 2018 av Joakim Green som idag är VD. Joakim har byggt digitala produkter i närmare 20 år och har tillsammans med teamet lyckats skapa ett framstående offertverktyg för hotell runt om i världen. Proposales är ledande i Norden och hundratals fristående hotell och etablerade hotellkedjor använder Proposales infrastruktur för att skicka offerter. Proposales har redan lyckats nå “default alive” och finns idag i 25 länder med siktet inställt på att expandera i Europa – och därefter vidare ut i världen.
   

  

  

  

 De har byggt en ny offertstandard (ersätter PDF) som gör det enkelt att skapa interaktiva och mobilvänliga offerter som dessutom kan kopplas ihop med CRM eller bokningssystem. Via Proposales kan användare besvara inkommande förfrågningar snabbare än någonsin och en inbyggd e-signatur gör offerten till ett juridiskt bindande avtal.
   

  

  

  

 Nyfiken att veta mer om produkten? Här (https//proposales.com/sv) kan du läsa mer och under intervjutillfället berättar vi givetvis mer om teknikerna bakom produkten.
   

  

  

  

 Nu finns en unik möjlighet att påverka Proposales framtid. Utöver en mycket utmanande och spännande roll får du ett konkurrenskraftigt erbjudande som inkluderar lön, aktieoptionsprogram, hälsoförmåner och mycket mer. Dessutom får du arbeta med otroligt kompetenta och tekniskt kunniga kollegor som har samma engagemang och passion för nya teknologier som dig!
   

  

  

  

 Läs om deras mission här (https//mission.proposales.com/) — byggd av Peter (Design Engineer hos Proposales).
   

  

  

  

**Arbetsuppgifter**
 Rollen som Principal Engineer innebär att du arbetar hands-on med utveckling av produkten tillsammans med dina kollegor. Vidare bidrar du med teknisk vägledning genom en djup och strategisk förståelse för produkten. Du ansvarar för arkitekturella beslut och för att teamet upprätthåller en hög kvalitet på det som levereras.
   

  

  

  

 Du är en viktig röst i produktutvecklingen och arbetar tätt tillsammans med VD och Head of Product för strategier och tekniska beslut. Några av dina fokusområden kommer att vara
   

  

  

  

* Teknisk vision Tillsammans med VD äga och driva utvecklingen av offertstandarden från ett tekniskt perspektiv.
* Plattformsarkitektur Ledande roll i teknisk utveckling och arkitektur.
* Säkerställa kvalitet Ansvarig för mjukvarans kvalitet och utvecklingen av interna och publika APIer.
* Planering och prioritering Samarbeta med Head of Product för att balansera kundbehov och teknisk skuld.
* Vägleda teamet Stötta det växande teamet att arbeta effektivt tillsammans, utveckla individuella styrkor och skapa nödvändiga strukturer för att kunna hantera utmaningar. Det formella personalansvaret ligger hos Head of Product för att kunna dedikera majoriteten av tiden till utvecklingen av plattformen.


**Utbildning, erfarenhet och personliga egenskaper**
* Erfarenhet av att driva storskaliga system eller projekt, gärna med erfarenhet av att ha ansvarat för den tekniska arkitekturen i en start-up.
* Gedigen kunskap och kontinuerligt uppdaterad om det senaste inom JavaScript (just nu används TypeScript, Next.js, Node.js samt React).
* Bekväm att arbeta i Vercel- och AWS-infrastruktur (RDS).
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med SQL-databaser (just nu används Postgres), GraphQL, databasoptimering och transaktioner.
* Mycket goda kunskaper i engelska, både tal och skrift. Svenska är meriterande.
* Expertis inom DevOps är meriterande.


 För att trivas i denna roll bör du vara en nyfiken och initiativrik person som håller dig uppdaterad om det senaste och gärna utforskar nya tekniker och tillvägagångssätt. Det är viktigt att du kan skapa en inspirerande teammiljö där idéer delas och öppenhet värderas. Du har en naturlig fallenhet för att hitta lösningar i stället för att fastna i utmaningar. Vidare är du noggrann och duktig på att planera och prioritera uppgifter för att säkerställa att uppgifterna utförs med högsta möjliga kvalitet. Vi tror att du uppskattar friheten i din arbetsroll där du får möjligheten att komma in i en stark tillväxtfas där din expertis är avgörande för produktens utveckling!
   

  

  

  

**Övrig information**
 Start Enligt överenskommelse
   

  

  

  

 Plats Torsgatan 26, Stockholm
   

  

  

  

 Övrigt Inför anställning genomförs en bakgrundskontroll.
   

  

  

  

 Vi gör ett löpande urval så skicka in din ansökan redan idag! Har du frågor eller funderingar är du varmt välkommen att höra av dig till rekryteringsansvarig, Elice, på elice.ohman@bravura.se.

title: Software Test Developer (Automotive Industry) 100072
description:
We are seeking a skilled and motivated Software Test Developer to join our team in the automotive industry. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience in testing and developing powertrain systems, with a strong background in Python programming and HIL (Hardware-in-the-Loop) environments.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* **System Test Execution and Development:** 
 Execute and develop system tests based on requirements to ensure the functionality and performance of the internal-combustion engine control system.
* **Regression Test Development:** 
 Design and develop regression tests through test analysis and test design, focusing on both vehicle and HIL-test environments.
* **Automation of Test Cases:** 
 Automate test cases using Python scripts to enhance testing efficiency and accuracy.
* **Requirement Reviews and Risk Analysis:** 
 Review requirements, conduct risk analysis, and ensure comprehensive test coverage.
* **Analysis and Reporting:** 
 Analyze test results and provide detailed reports on findings, including potential issues and recommendations.



  





**Required Skills and Qualifications:** 



* **Experience:** 
 Several years of experience in testing and developing powertrain systems.
* **Python Proficiency:** 
 Extensive experience with Python programming for test automation.
* **HIL Experience:** 
 Proven experience with Hardware-in-the-Loop (HIL) testing environments.
* **Knowledge of Electrical Systems:** 
 Strong understanding of electrical systems in vehicles.
* **Communication Skills:** 
 Proficient in verbal and written communication in English. Swedish language skills are considered a plus.
* **Personal Attributes:** 
 Flexible, self-motivated, and proactive in proposing solutions and improvements.



  





**Education:** 



* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (preferred but not required).

title: Trade & Logistics konsult (.)
description:
Att arbeta på COSMO CONSULT är inte som på andra ställen.
   

  

 Utforska vår COSMO-verse och låt dig inspireras av den positiva energin bland COSMOnautarna. Tillsammans skapar vi framtiden - for people, by people. Vi utvecklas tillsammans.
   

  

 Upplev genuin respekt i en miljö där du kan känna dig trygg, en plats full av passion och innovation.
   

  

 Anslut dig till vårt team och bli en del av en av världens ledande Microsoft-partners för verksamhetstransformation och digitalisering.
   

  

**Älska ditt jobb** 
 på nytt – skicka oss din ansökan som
   

  

 Trade & Logistics konsult
   

  

 Om tjänsten:
   

  

* Som konsult inom vårt område Trade & Logistics blir din viktigaste uppgift att hjälpa våra kunder inom handel och logistik att förbättra och utveckla sina affärsprocesser. Du kommer vara delaktig i projekt som rör både införande av nya affärssystem och löpande förbättringsarbete. Du skapar värde för kunden genom din förståelse för kundens verksamhet och förmåga att vägleda dem till processförbättringar som möjliggörs med affärssystemet Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central.
* Våra arbetsformer innebär att du ibland arbetar i ett större projektteam och ibland möter kunden själv. Viss del av arbetet görs på något av våra kontor och viss del av arbetet görs ute hos våra kunder. Detta innebär att tjänsten kan innebära en del resor beroende på kund och projekt. Möjligheten finns även att få delta i internationella projekt.
* Arbetet som konsult är otroligt spännande och varierande - och du kommer snabbt att se att det arbete du utför skapar resultat hos kunderna. Hos oss på COSMO CONSULT kommer du få möjligheter att arbeta tillsammans med flera av Sveriges mest erfarna och kompetenta BC/NAV-kollegor. För oss är teamwork en självklarhet, och vi hjälper varandra att kontinuerligt förbättras.


 Du har erfarenhet av:
   

  

* Relevant utbildning från högskola eller universitet och flera års kvalificerad erfarenhet från tillverkande industri, antingen som ledare i linjebefattning eller som affärssystemkonsult.
* Flera års erfarenhet från implementationer av Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central/Dynamics NAV eller annat relevant affärssystem, som konsult alternativt som superanvändare på kundsidan. Ett plus är om du har erfarenhet av att jobba i projekt med Azure DevOps. Goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift.
* Vi söker dig som är en förtroendeingivande representant för COSMO CONSULT. Du har ett starkt kundfokus och slutför alltid de uppdrag som du påbörjat. Det är även viktigt att du är ansvarstagande och kan driva din egen utveckling mot uppsatta mål, även om vi alltid finns där som stöd. För att passa in i vårt team tror vi att du trivs med att arbeta som en del i en projektgrupp likväl som att utföra uppdrag på egen hand. Som lagspelare har du en stark vilja att dela med dig av din kunskap till andra samt visar andra respekt och omtanke. Utifrån senioritetsnivå bidrar du även till egen beläggning samt deltar i varierande omfattning i marknadsbearbetning hos befintliga och nya kunder


 Lika lika och unika.
   

  

 Det är det som skiljer oss åt:
   

  

* Hos oss är alla en del av teamet - din röst behövs, även när det gäller vår egen företagsutveckling.
* Det är viktigt för oss att du känner dig uppskattad och sedd.
* Platsoberoende och flexibelt arbete är en självklarhet för oss. I rollen ingår det att kontinuerligt besöka något av våra kontor runt om i Sverige: Stockholm, Göteborg, Malmö och Umeå.
* Internationellt samarbete är en del av vår vardag - upptäck andra kulturer och nya miljöer.
* En säker och positiv arbetsmiljö är vår högsta prioritet.
* Förändring är en del av oss, och det är därför vi aldrig står stilla utan alltid utvecklas.
* Det ligger oss varmt om hjärtat att tillsammans med dig forma din vidareutveckling.
* Hos oss kan du följa din personliga karriärsväg.
* Vi tar vårt del av ansvaret för människor och miljö på allvar.


 Do you want to become part of the team?
   

  

 Apply directly online with your informative application documents and your earliest possible start date.
   

  

 Do you have questions?
   

  

 No problem.
   

  

 career@cosmoconsult.com
   

  

 Do you want more #insideCOSMO?

title: Senior Sales Engineer
description:
**Build your future with Sovos.**



If you're seeking a career where innovation meets impact, you've come to the right place. As a global leader, Sovos is transforming tax compliance from a business requirement to a force for growth while revolutionising how businesses navigate the ever-changing regulatory landscape.



At Sovos, we're dedicated to more than just solving compliance challenges – we're committed to making a positive and lasting difference in everything we do. Our teams operate on the modern edge of digital technology, working not only to solve complex business challenges but also to enrich our personal, professional, and local communities.



Our purpose-built systems provide the tools you need to thrive in a world where governments demand increased visibility, faster reporting and greater control over business processes. Excited about the possibilities? So are we!



Don’t worry if you don't check all the boxes – apply anyway! We're focused on hiring the right people, not just the "right" resume. It's not about what you've done elsewhere; it's all about what you're capable of doing here.

  


**The Work You'll Do:**



The Senior Sales Engineer will work with the Direct Sales and Alliance teams to provide technical support during the sales cycle for our relevant solutions within Sovos’ Indirect Tax Technology Suite (ITTS). The Senior Sales Engineer acts as the bridge between sales and product, professional services & support, utilizing technical expertise to support the sales team and deliver solutions that meet customer needs.


The Senior Sales Engineer will be adept at leveraging technical expertise to deliver innovative solutions, ensuring a seamless integration of product offerings with client needs. Also, this role possesses strong communication, enabling effective cross-functional collaboration and the successful execution of complex sales initiatives. Known for developing robust sales strategies, conducting impactful product demonstrations, and providing comprehensive technical support to both clients and internal sales teams. The Senior Sales Engineer will report to the Sales Engineering Manager – Europe.


*More specifically you will:*


* Provide superior domain expertise around ITTS solutions
* Maintain expert level understanding of functionality and technical architecture of our products
* Assist in the client discovery process to help uncover unforeseen challenges and desired solution architecture. Also conduct reviews of discovery questionnaires to ensure customer landscape knowledge is documented and any other sales opportunities are identified
* Develop a firm understanding of customer needs, pain points, and requirements around the ITTS and align Sovos solutions to fulfill the needs and requirements to eliminate the pain
* Work closely with Sovos’ Sales to conduct sales and solutions presentations
* Collaborate with Professional Services and product functions to ensure a successful onboarding post sale
* Maintain and continually improve demonstration capabilities in order to be able to present to customers a compelling and coherent narrative as to the key features and benefits of Sovos solutions
* Conduct in-depth technical presentations and product demonstrations to prospects and clients.
* Act with integrity and demonstrate ethical behavior in all matters with all stakeholders
* Take full responsibility for ensuring internal and external customer satisfaction
* Demonstrate a high degree of self-awareness and commitment to personal development and learning
* Focus on process improvement, adept at optimizing sales workflows and driving efficiency to enhance revenue growth and customer satisfaction.
* Develop and lead training sessions both within and outside the Sales Engineer department
* Serve as a subject matter expert surrounding the creation of RFP and RFI responses for prospective new clients
  

**What We Need From You**


* Bachelor’s in related field, or equivalent combination of experience and education
* Minimum 6 years of Sales Engineer experience or equivalent
* Ability to be strategic towards business outcomes as well as manage and handle day-to-day details and deadlines
* Strong team orientation with a history of working collaboratively in a fast paced environment
* Ability to manage multiple projects at once and prioritize activities
* Thorough knowledge of MS Office software including Excel, Word, & Power Point
* Well-developed business ethics and the ability to maintain a high level of discretion
* Self-motivated and strong drive to succeed
* Solid knowledge on different communication protocols (e.g. APIs, SFTP, AS2 etc. as well as different delivery formats (e.g. IDOC, EDIFACT, XML, UBL etc).
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English.
* Multiple language skills preferred
* Moderate travel required for client meetings, trade shows, Sovos Events, and special projects
* Essential Job Functions:
	+ Interact effectively with teammates, colleagues and customers
	+ Comprehend and communicate complex concepts
	+ Concentrate, analyse and resolve complex problems
	+ Utilise technology (e.g. phone systems, computer hardware and software applications) to fulfil work requirements

**What Does Sovos Offer You?**


The tools to enhance your life - because we want you to enjoy your life outside of work and inside!


* An opportunity to work with a global team
* Bi-Weekly Meeting Free Days!
* Mentoring Programs
* Globally recognised Training and Development programs
* Benefits

*Sovos is an equal opportunity employer committed to providing an environment that celebrates diversity and where equal employment opportunities are available to all applicants and employees. We do not discriminate against race, color, religions, national origin, age, sex, marital status, physical or mental disability, veteran status, gender identity, sexual orientation, or any other characteristic provided by law. At Sovos, all employees are encouraged to bring their whole selves to work.*

  

**Company Background**


Sovos is a global provider of tax, compliance and trust solutions and services that enable businesses to navigate an increasingly regulated world with true confidence. Purpose-built for always-on compliance capabilities, our scalable IT-driven solutions meet the demands of an evolving and complex global regulatory landscape. Sovos’ cloud-based software platform provides an unparalleled level of integration with business applications and government compliance processes.


More than 100,000 customers in 100+ countries – including half the Fortune 500 – trust Sovos for their compliance needs. Sovos annually processes more than three billion transactions across 19,000 global tax jurisdictions. Bolstered by a robust partner program more than 400 strong, Sovos brings to bear an unrivaled global network for companies across industries and geographies. Founded in 1979, Sovos has operations across the Americas and Europe, and is owned by Hg and TA Associates. For more information visit http://www.sovos.com and follow us on LinkedIn and Twitter.
company_description: Sovos is a global SaaS company capable of meeting your regulatory compliance needs anywhere you do business.

title: Senior Presales Specialist - SAP LeanIX
description:
**We help the world run better**

At SAP, we enable you to bring out your best. Our company culture is focused on collaboration and a shared passion to help the world run better. How? We focus every day on building the foundation for tomorrow and creating a workplace that embraces differences, values flexibility, and is aligned to our purpose-driven and future-focused work. We offer a highly collaborative, caring team environment with a strong focus on learning and development, recognition for your individual contributions, and a variety of benefit options for you to choose from.


SAP LeanIX is looking for a Senior Presales Specialist (Senior Solution Engineer) for Nordic region. The Solutions Engineer will be the technical asset to the Nordics Sales Team, helping our Enterprise Account Executives and their prospective customers understand how to solve different business challenges with the SAP LeanIX solutions.

  

In this role, you will educate and guide current and prospective customers toward the optimal setup needed to derive value from our product in a variety of different environments. Solution Engineers should be both technical and possess excellent communication skills the ability to describe complex problems using easy to understand language.  

  

This position will work closely with the Customer Success and Product teams to ensure alignment with all product developments and customer use cases. In addition to having knowledge of Enterprise Architecture frameworks and IT Portfolio Management methodologies, the ideal candidate is passionate about both the LeanIX product and taking a consultative approach toward advising customers.

  

Ideally location is in Sweden or Denmark.

 **WHAT IS WAITING FOR YOU?**

  

Perform technical discovery with prospective customers to uncover business challenges  

Solve problems and demonstrate value by architecting customer solutions  

Develop relationships with technical stakeholders during their evaluation of LeanIX  

Convey customer requirements to internal technical experts when necessary  

Successfully manage and execute technical proof of concepts (POCs)  

Build a community of technical resources at our partners that will sponsor LeanIX within the partner and their customer base

 **WHAT ARE WE LOOKING FOR?**


5+ years of Enterprise level presales experience within B2B SaaS environment  

Experience with giving tailored software live demos to prospects, customers or partners.  

Nice to have knowledge of EA or IT Service Management sales experience  

Ability to compile powerful PPT decks in minimal time and relevant content to the audience.  

Nice to have previous presales experience with IT engineering and operations targeted personas  

Analytical mindset with a focus on data-driven decision making  

Outstanding technical communication, presentation and relationship skills  

Passionate about solving problems with technology  

Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously  

Demonstrate great solution selling - Through storytelling and solution demos, help prospect to understand how LeanIX support digital transformation.  

Fluent in English and local language.

  

SAP LeanIX is a market leader for Enterprise Architecture, driving the modernization of IT landscapes and continuous business transformation. By offering a data-driven and automated approach enhanced with AI, SAP LeanIX helps organizations make sound decisions and collaborate more effectively. Your application information will therefore be shared across SAP and LeanIX recruiting and hiring teams.

  

#LeanIX


**Bring out your best**


SAP innovations help more than four hundred thousand customers worldwide work together more efficiently and use business insight more effectively. Originally known for leadership in enterprise resource planning (ERP) software, SAP has evolved to become a market leader in end-to-end business application software and related services for database, analytics, intelligent technologies, and experience management. As a cloud company with two hundred million users and more than one hundred thousand employees worldwide, we are purpose-driven and future-focused, with a highly collaborative team ethic and commitment to personal development. Whether connecting global industries, people, or platforms, we help ensure every challenge gets the solution it deserves. At SAP, you can bring out your best.

**We win with inclusion**


SAP’s culture of inclusion, focus on health and well-being, and flexible working models help ensure that everyone – regardless of background – feels included and can run at their best. At SAP, we believe we are made stronger by the unique capabilities and qualities that each person brings to our company, and we invest in our employees to inspire confidence and help everyone realize their full potential. We ultimately believe in unleashing all talent and creating a better and more equitable world.  

SAP is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to the values of Equal Employment Opportunity and provide accessibility accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are interested in applying for employment with SAP and are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your application, please send an e-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations Team: Careers@sap.com  

For SAP employees: Only permanent roles are eligible for the SAP Employee Referral Program, according to the eligibility rules set in the SAP Referral Policy. Specific conditions may apply for roles in Vocational Training.

**EOE AA M/F/Vet/Disability:**


Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to their age, race, religion, national origin, ethnicity, age, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, et al), sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, protected veteran status, or disability.  

Successful candidates might be required to undergo a background verification with an external vendor.

title: Platform Engineer
description:
Stockholm Hybrid
  
  

The world is changing in the way we consume products, from ownership to usership, and DigitalRoute is positioned in the centre of the transition. Because, when enterprises pivot to usage-based business models, they often make an unfortunate discovery. Their systems weren’t built to handle the massive data volumes and complexity that usage-based models generate. This causes them to leak revenue and respond too slowly to customer demand. DigitalRoute solves this by creating a real-time usage data layer for enterprises. Our products transform raw usage data into clear information for billing, in real time and at high scale.
  
  

As a Platform Engineer, you'll design, implement, and maintain our infrastructure, including data systems. You'll work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure our platform is optimized for reliability, availability, and performance. If you're passionate about automation, monitoring, and best practices to build robust systems, this is the opportunity for you to make a significant impact in a fast-paced environment.
  
  

What you'll do
  
  

Design, implement, and maintain scalable, high-availability infrastructure for applications and services.
  
Develop automation scripts and tools to streamline deployment, monitoring, and incident response processes.
  
Implement best practices for system reliability, including fault tolerance, disaster recovery, and performance optimization.
  
Collaborate with engineering teams to ensure new features and services are reliable and scalable.
  
Work with data platform engineers to enable data collection, processing, access, usability, and monitoring.
  
Monitor system performance and proactively identify and address potential issues before they impact production.
  
Participate in on-call rotations and respond to incidents in a timely and effective manner.
  
Continuously improve systems and processes for better reliability, scalability, and efficiency.
  
Mentor team members and promote a culture of reliability and data excellence.
  
  

What you'll bring
  
  

Proven experience as a Platform Engineer or similar role in a production environment.
  
Strong proficiency in cloud computing platforms such as AWS (preferably), Azure, or GCP.
  
Proficiency in Terraform for Infrastructure as Code (IaC).
  
Experience with containerization technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes.
  
Proficiency in scripting and automation using languages such as Python, Bash, or PowerShell.
  
Solid understanding of networking, security, and system administration principles.
  
Experience with monitoring and logging tools such as Datadog, Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack, or similar.
  
Expertise in modern database technologies, including NoSQL (e.g., Elasticsearch, MongoDB, Cassandra) and relational databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, Oracle, MySQL).
  
Knowledge of data storage, database design, data warehousing, and ETL processes.
  
Understanding of data security concepts, differential privacy, and privacy regulations (e.g., GDPR, CCPA) is a plus.
  
Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to troubleshoot complex issues in distributed systems.
  
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
  
  

We apply continuous selection, and the position may be filled before the last application date.
  
  

DigitalRoute wants to be part of an inclusive and diverse environment and we are actively looking for qualified candidates irrespective of gender, sexual orientation, ethnicity, disability, or age. You will be part of a global and diverse company where our differences are our strengths.
  
  

Apply now! We look forward to you joining us!
  
  

We care
  
  

We team up
  
  

We are covered
  
  

We work our way
  
  

We invest in parenthood
  
  

We create our destiny
  
  

ABOUT THE COMPANY
  
  

DigitalRoute processes data about how customers use digital services. Our software is used by telecoms, streaming services, SaaS companies, and many others. Why does this data matter? Data about usage helps companies send accurate invoices, improve customer experiences, and control how much of a service is used. It even helps companies create entirely new services based on customer behavior. We help some of the world’s most iconic brands shift to subscription and usage-based services.
  
  

Everyone makes a differen
  
We believe in the individual. We are not just saying it but knowing that everyone makes a difference. Being a relatively small company with a flat organization, people here have room to influence, be visible and make a real difference. We want people to feel empowered to raise opinions, drive initiatives and take ownership.
  
  

Big-hearted across the wo
  
We have a soul of a small and big-hearted team working together across the globe. Here, it is as natural to work with someone hundreds of miles away as with someone sitting next to you. And we do it together as one team. We actively strive for an environment where everyone feels included and valued.
  
  

Dedicated to succeed.
  
We are a growth company with high ambitions, chosen by the most iconic brands in the world. With a true passion for our customers, we constantly go after new grounds to be at the forefront of what we do. We provide the possibilities to grow in a culture where flexibility, courage, and dedication to succeed take us to the next level.
  
  

Fares Fares
company_description: DigitalRoute processes data about how customers use digital services. Our software is used by telecoms, streaming services, SaaS companies, and many others.

title: Business Analyst
description:
#### **We're looking for a Business Analyst to uncover the insights and recommendations to help us better serve the needs of our thousands of companies and millions of users.**

### **About Kivra**

We believe that digital postal services make life easier for both the sender and the recipient, while at the same time contributing to a more sustainable world. Over 1 billion envelopes are sent through Kivra every year, in Sweden alone. We think that there’s a better, faster, more secure and more environmentally friendly way to do this. That’s why we created Kivra.

**What you'll do**


You will be part of the Data Team at Kivra. You’ll work with product and function teams (your stakeholders) to understand the nuances of their business problems and help them find the insights to solve those problems and make better decisions. You’ll have three typical responsibilities:

* Work together with your stakeholders to develop, improve, and maintain the data, dashboards, reports and visualizations they need to make good business decisions; be responsible for driving the data capabilities within your product team/domain
* As part of the Data Team, be responsible for parts of the team’s processes and/or tooling; and maintain and improve the team’s capabilities - e.g. areas could include developing and sharing best practices for how we use Tableau in the team, or suggestions on how we design parts of our data warehouse
* Support the business on larger analytics projects - either cross team analytics projects, deep-dives on particular problems, or help drive data initiatives

**Who you are**


We believe that you have the relevant experience and qualifications. You want to join a fun and friendly team, and work hands-on in a high-paced environment with fast decision making. Moreover, you are analytical and like solving problems.


Furthermore we think that you:

* Have at least 3 years of relevant experience.
* Have experience working with BI/visualization tools, e.g. Tableau, Qlik, Looker, Power BI, Mode, Data Studio etc. Our Data team uses Tableau.
* Have good knowledge and understanding of SQL.
* Are able to combine data from various data sources, and are comfortable with basic data transformations and manipulation
* Can effectively communicate your insights and analytics to stakeholders - you will often be working directly with them.

  

And it would be a bonus if:

* You have a relevant degree (e.g. statistics, business, data science, mathematics etc.)
* You are familiar with GCP and BigQuery (or any other cloud data warehouse)
* You have experience working with data transformation tools (e.g. dbt) and notebooks (e.g. Hex or Jupyter Notebook)
* You have some experience with Python
* You have worked with Amplitude, Mixpanel or similar tools for product analytics on mobile apps
* You are familiar working with GitHub
* You have some experience with A/B testing and experimentation within mobile applications

  

We believe that you, just like us, care about your teammates and thrive in a work-dynamic built on collaboration and transparent communication. You are willing to learn and develop new skills and try new approaches.


**Additional information**


The role is full-time and our offices are based in Stockholm. However, the Data Team has a hybrid work location policy - in practice this means most of the team is in the office ~2 days a week, and come into the office as required for certain workshops or important meetings/discussions.


You will be part of the Data Team and report to the manager of the Data Team. Fluency in English is required and fluency in Swedish is a plus but not required. We are unfortunately not able to sponsor new work permits, but are able to sponsor/renew existing work permits.

**We offer**


Kivra offers a place in a committed team with the opportunity for a high degree of innovation. You will be involved in influencing Kivra's exciting business and product development of a service that is currently used by more than half of Sweden's population. One of Kivra's values is happy-happy, which is also reflected in the concern for Kivra's staff. In addition to collective agreements and wellness, we offer a number of other great benefits.

**How to apply**


Easy peasy, just send in your CV and cover letter (preferably in English) as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to contact Sarah Ohlsson, Talent Acquisition Partner, at sarah.ohlsson@kivra.com.

title: Hotellreceptionist
description:
Best Western Plus Skogshöjd slog upp dörrarna i januari 2024 och vi söker just nu dig som vill bli en del av vårt team! Best Western Plus Skogshöjd har 225 rum, en stor konferensavdelning med, SPA, restaurang och bar.
  
Vi letar efter en person med ett positivt förhållningssätt, stort servicetänk och som kan hantera ett emellanåt högt tempo. Vi lägger stor vikt vid att hitta medarbetare med rätt inställning och attityd och som tillsammans med oss vill skapa en härlig arbetsplats och leverera service i världsklass till våra gäster!
  
Dina arbetsuppgifter kommer bland annat innefatta in- och utcheckning av våra hotell och konferensgäster, ta emot bokningar via mail och telefon, hantering av enklare ekonomisk administration samt bidra till merförsäljning.
  
Vi söker dig som i första hand har erfarenhet av hotellreception. Har du arbetat i systemet Opera/Opera Cloud tidigare är det en stor fördel. Det är ofta ett högt tempo i receptionen och vi letar efter dig som har ett positivt förhållningssätt, kan ta eget ansvar och som tillsammans med dina kollegor kan driva receptionen framåt, även under den tid det kan vara lite stressigt.
  
Känner du att jobbet kan passa dig? Maila din ansökan till arbete@skogshojd.se och skriv "Hotellreceptionist 100%" som ämne. Vi har tyvärr inte möjlighet att svara på några frågor eller ta emot ansökan över telefon. Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Receptionist Scandic Infra City
description:
\*\*Scandic Infra City\*\* ligger en kvart ifrån Arlanda och är Nordens ledande kongress- och möteshotell, som dessutom har en egen inomhusträdgård. Vårt främsta fokus är konferens, event och mässor, vilket innebär en stor variation av gäster och besökare. Vi erbjuder våra medarbetare en rolig och utmanande arbetsplats i en unik hotellmiljö. Delar du vår passion för unika upplevelser? Då är du den vi söker!


**Nu söker vi en Receptionist till Scandic Infra City.**



Oavsett varför gästen kommer till oss är det få saker som är så uppskattade som ett vänligt ansikte som hälsar välkommen. Du agerar värd tillsammans med övriga teamet på hotellet och skapar en gästupplevelse i världsklass.



Hos oss får du ta ett stort eget ansvar för att ta de beslut som krävs för att göra gästen nöjd och teamen utvecklar och förbättrar arbetssätt och service i takt med att omvärlden förändras. Vi är nämligen övertygade om att det är när du får utvecklas och bidra med all din kompetens och erfarenhet som vi överträffar gästens förväntningar. På köpet får vi kul på jobbet!



Så ta med dig dina erfarenheter, ditt engagemang och ditt sätt att tänka till oss – och bidra till en kultur där vi bryr oss på riktigt: om varandra, våra gäster och vår planet. Välkommen till Scandic!


**Vad är innebär rollen?**



Du som arbetar i receptionen är ansvarig för att våra gäster får service i världsklass. Du är spindeln i nätet som ser till att gästen alltid är i fokus. Du är den som går igenom ankomstlistan och lägger tid på detaljerna. Ser till att gästens önskemål uppfylls. Du har alltid ett leende på läpparna och en kreativ lösning i bakfickan. Du löser det mesta och är en stjärna på att vända en missnöjd gäst till en nöjd gäst. Din arbetsplats är vår lobby. För det är där du möter flest gäster. I ansvarsområdet ingår även administrativt arbete, säkerhetsarbete och arbete med försäljning.


Arbetet i receptionen innebär att checka in och ut hotellets gäster, hälsa välkommen och ge gästen den information den behöver om sin vistelse. Du hanterar bokningar i systemet Opera Cloud och hanterar administrativa uppgifter runt gäster och säkerhet. Allt arbete sker med gästnöjdhet och försäljning i fokus.


Hotellet har öppet dygnet runt och det är därför viktigt att du trivs med att arbeta i skift (förmiddagar, eftermiddagar och helger).


**Vem är du?**



För att passa i rollen tror vi att du har en väl utvecklad social förmåga och är kapabel att hantera att det händer många olika saker samtidigt. Det är mycket viktigt att du kan förmedla ett gott värdskap till hotellets gäster.



Du har också vana och kunskap i att arbeta med dator som arbetsredskap.


Eftersom arbetet till stor del består av att kommunicera med gäster är goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska en förutsättning. Talar du ytterligare ett språk är det meriterande.


Allra viktigast är dock dina personliga egenskaper och din inställning. För att passa i rollen behöver du vara en lyhörd och prestigelös lagspelare som tar ett stort ansvar för dina arbetsuppgifter och helhetsresultatet.


**Information om tjänsten**



Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning på deltid 60%



Vi tar enbart emot ansökningar via vår hemsida. Alla ansökningar kommer att behandlas löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag, varför vi ber dig att ansöka så snart som möjligt. I denna rekrytering använder vi oss av ett enklare test om service vid urvalet.



Vi ser fram emot att välkomna dig till oss på Scandic!



Ps. på vår hemsida kan du läsa mer om vår kultur, vad tjänsten innebär och om våra förmåner!


  
**Vi har riktigt bra förmåner**
-------------------------------


Rabatt när du äter, dricker och övernattar hos oss


Family & Friends rabatt för din familj och vänner


Rabatt hos våra partnerföretag


Pension & försäkringar enligt kollektivavtal


Friskvårdsbidrag


Utbildning och utveckling via interna plattformar


  
Vi når längre när olikheter bejakas. Hos oss får du utrymme att vara dig själv och utvecklas i den riktning du vill, med trygga villkor och schyssta avtal som grund. Ta med dig dina erfarenheter, ditt engagemang och ditt sätt att tänka till oss - bidra till en kultur där vi bryr oss på riktigt: om varandra, våra gäster och vår planet. Välkommen till Scandic.



Delar du våra värderingar?


**BE A PRO** **BE YOU** **BE CARING** **BE BOLD**

  

  

...uppmuntrar alla att göra skillnad för miljön och att det var en av våra kollegor inom housekeeping som kom på idén om ”häng-upp-handduken”.
...i Sverige blivit rankad som besöksnäringens mest attraktiva arbetsgivare två år i rad, i Visitas årliga undersökning.
... bara serverar kaffe som är ekologiskt och Fairtrade eller UTZ-certifierat.
...tack vare vårt stora miljöengagemang, blivit rankad som branschens mest hållbara arbetsgivare elva år i rad, av Sustainable Brand Index.
...under 2014 inledde ett samarbete med organisationen Real Stars, centrerat kring ”Fair Sex”, dvs. arbete mot människo- och sexhandel.

title: Extrapersonal Kundtjänst
description:
Studerar du på universitet och vill ha ett jobb på helger och kvällar och möjlighet till sommarjobb. Då kanske det här jobbet är perfekt för dig.
  
Onslip
  
Onslip utvecklar digitala kassa- och restaurangsystem för restauranger och affärer runt om hela Sverige. Med den senaste tekniken hjälper vi restaurangägare att förenkla deras vardag med minskad administration och ökad lönsamhet. Vårt kontor ligger i centrala Linköping och vi är ett tight team om 15. Läs mer om oss på onslip.com och spana in oss på facebook.
  
Jobbet
  
Vår kundtjänst vårdar det viktigaste vi har, våra kunder. Du kommer att hjälpa restauranger, caféer och andra företag med frågor och tekniska problem. Arbetet sker via telefon eller online när kunden tar kontakt med Onslip men du tar även proaktivt kontakt med kunder för att säkerställa att kunderna är nöjda och att dom har allt dom behöver för att bedriva en effektiv verksamhet. Du hanterar även frågor om avtal, fakturor och andra kundtjänstrelaterade ärenden.
  
Våra kunder
  
Vi har passionerade företagare som kunder över hela Sverige, framför allt inom restaurang. Våra kunders framgång är vår framgång och därför jobbar vi outtröttligt med att ha Sveriges nöjdaste kunder.
  
Vem är du?
  
Du är ansvarsfull, driven, serviceinriktad, gillar att jobba i team och har ett intresse för teknik. Vi ser att du har en gymnasial utbildning men utöver det finns inget krav på utbildning, på Onslip kommer du att få all utbildning som du behöver.
  
Arbetstider
  
Vi kommer tillsammans fram till ett schema under supportens öppettider. Goda möjligheter finns även för utökat arbete under sommaren. OB-ersättning tillkommer för obekväm arbetstid.
  
  

Supportens öppettider
  
Vardagar 09:00-18:00
  
Helger 11:00-15:00

title: Senior Customer Solutions Manager, AGS EMEA, Europe North, CSM
description:
Basic Qualifications
  
  

* Experience leading complex, large scale IT/digital/business transformation programs
* Experience in a senior customer facing role
* Superior written and verbal communication skills, including a demonstrated ability to effectively deliver information to C-suite/VP level
* Strong organizational and troubleshooting skills with precise attention to detail


Senior Customer Solutions Manager
  
  

As an Amazon Web Services (AWS) Senior Customer Solutions Manager you will be responsible for helping guide the largest and most complex AWS customers along their multi-year journey to the cloud. In this highly visible position you will ensure that all AWS teams are working together effectively and efficiently to deliver outcomes for the customer.
  
  

In the role, you will be a critical strategic partner to our customers, leveraging your delivery experience with large scale transformations and helping shepherd them through their stages of AWS adoption. Guiding the customer through the operational, educational and governance aspects of a successful AWS cloud journey.
  
  

You will interface with customer and AWS senior leadership, driving collaboration between the other core account groups (Sales, Support, Solutions Architecture and Professional Services), product/engineering teams, and customer teams; planning and supporting major workload migrations. You will translate strategic initiatives into executable actions, working backwards from our customers key milestones. The execution of education plans, roadmap to business outcome alignments, Executive Briefing Sessions, go-live events and transitions are a few items owned by the CSM that are critical to the success of our customer’s cloud journey.
  
  

At AWS, you are encouraged to think big, invent and take ownership on customer challenges. You will not only bring the best of AWS/ Amazon to our customers, you will proactively help solve the customer’s challenges through new ideas, tools and mechanisms.
  
  

Successful candidates will have a strong delivery and change management background, be detail oriented, have excellent problem-solving abilities, and be exemplary communicators both at the executive and project team level. You will be a peer leader, have the ability to gain stakeholder buy-in, negotiate and lead teams. Your enterprise experience and operational excellence will influence the team’s decisions, provide insight, and help drive secure and robust solutions.
  
  

You will evangelize AWS services and influence customers for adopting them. You should be passionate about delivering a great customer experience by deploying AWS solutions and inspiring innovation. You will be obsessed with contributing to the day-to-day management of your customers successful adoption of AWS.
  
  

Do you look around corners for ways to engage and service customers? Are you passionate about using technology to solve business problems that have big customer impact?
  
  

Come build the future with us.
  
  

Preferred Qualifications
  
  

* Direct experience implementing AWS/cloud services
* Robust understanding of key technology and market trends
* PMP and/or SCRUM/Agile, SAFe certified
* Deep understanding of any of the following industries: Financial Services, Retail, Manufacturing, Media & Entertainment, Games, Healthcare & Lifesciences


Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy\_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.
