title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
The world is changing in the way we consume products, from ownership to usership, and DigitalRoute is positioned in the centre of the transition. Because, when enterprises pivot to usage-based business models, they often make an unfortunate discovery. Their systems weren’t built to handle the massive data volumes and complexity that usage-based models generate. This causes them to leak revenue and respond too slowly to customer demand. DigitalRoute solves this by creating a real-time usage data layer for enterprises. Our products transform raw usage data into clear information for billing, in real time and at high scale.
 



  





 As a senior and experienced Software Engineer at DigitalRoute, you will immediately play an important role in the development of our SaaS offering, a multi-tenant cloud service called Usage Engine Cloud Edition. This product is growing quickly. We are already processing billions of events per month and some very well-known companies are coming on board right now.
 



  





 You will not just be another person in a sea of people - you will be influencing things like software design, scalability, performance, maintainability and quality.
 



 Your expertise and your experience will be instrumental in helping us stay ahead and have a competitive edge in the market. Active collaboration across teams and professions is natural in DR, we know you like that as well.
 



  





**What** 
 you'll do
 


* You will be working in one of our four SaaS engineering teams, where people really enjoy collaborating and will welcome you with open arms!
* You will be building a product where things like scalability, security, transaction safety, and high throughput are key. Some very well-known companies will use what you create!
* The product is cloud-native and multi-tenant; running on AWS, using tech like Node, Typescript, Kubernetes, Kafka and AWS services. We continuously improve things.
* Naturally, you will have influence in discussions about software design and architecture.
* Your input on how to do all this in a lean, agile and efficient way is also very welcome.



  





**What** 
 you'll bring
 


* Professional experience and seniority.
* Strong and proven tech skills; likely with most of these: Java, Node.js, TypeScript, AWS, Kubernetes, Azure, GCP.
* Deep experience with Microservice architectures & event-driven architectures, as well as Kafka or some other distributed event streaming platform.
* Database skills plus experience from handling huge amounts of transactions.
* Plenty of experience and opinions on software architecture & design.
* Quality thinking, based on care for the customers, design, release processes, testing and more.
* Teamwork preference – you enjoy helping others understand, grow and perform.
* Communication skills; you can explain things both with and without all the details.
* Experience working with (and improving) agile team processes.



  





 We apply continuous selection, and the position may be filled before the last application date.
 



  





 DigitalRoute wants to be part of an inclusive and diverse environment and we are actively looking for qualified candidates irrespective of gender, sexual orientation, ethnicity, disability, or age. You will be part of a global and diverse company where our differences are our strengths.
 



  





 We Look forward to your application!

title: Senior Embedded Engineer
description:
**Jobbeskrivning**
***Join the world of the future in a fast-growing international company!***
 SEGULA Technologies is an innovative engineering group present in 30 countries, with 140 offices and more than 13 000 employees worldwide. Our consultants bring their valuable knowledge in all the major industrial sectors: automotive, rail, aerospace, naval, energy, oil & gas and pharmaceutical.
   

  

 With a global presence and a positive start-up mentality, we adapt rapidly to the ever-changing market and foster a close relationship with our customers thanks to the expertise of our employees.
   

  

 At SEGULA Technologies Sweden our consultants are key contributors to the customers’ projects. Our cross-functional teams of highly skilled international professionals create cutting-edge human-centric technology that makes life easier and more enjoyable.
   

  

 Take a new challenge and join us! For more information: https://www.segulatechnologies.com
   

  

**Main Tasks And Responsibilities**
* Design and implement software of embedded devices and systems from requirements to production and deployment
* Design, code, develop, test and debug C++ / C software
* Review code and design
* Analyse and enhance efficiency, stability, and scalability of system resources
* Integrate and validate new product designs
* Provide post-production support to fix bugs and improve features
* Work with Product Owners / Scrum Masters to estimate and prioritize requirement backlog


**Desired Skills And Experience**
* B.Sc. / M.Sc. in Electric / Electronic / Computer Engineering or equivalent
* Several years (3-5) proven working experience in C/C++
* Swedish citizenship
* Swedish & English speaking high level
* Experience in hands-on development and troubleshooting on embedded targets
* Experience in system design with preemptive, multitasking real-time operating systems
* Deep knowledge of OS coding technique, IP protocols, interfaces and hardware subsystems
* Linux Kernel driver development experience is an added value
* Adequate knowledge of reading schematics and datasheets for components
* Useful to have: Defence or radiosystems experience
* Strong documentation and writing competence
* Proficient communication and presentation skills
* Talent to build positive relationships both internally and externally
* Capacity to integrate easily in a dynamic international business environment
* Ability to multitask, meet deadlines and problem solve in stressful situations


 This job requires a seurity check and classification process done on the applicant.
   

  

**Ytterligare information**
 To thrive in this role we believe that you enjoy working collaboratively and that you are proactive in taking initiative. To apply for this position, you need to have a valid work VISA within the European Union. We embrace diversity and equality and attach great importance to your personal qualities. We are continuously recruiting, so welcome with you application today!
   

  

*We would like to inform you that our recruitment process is currently taking longer than usual due to the summer holiday period. We appreciate your understanding and patience during this time.* 
*For questions or further information, please contact talia.brorsson@segulagrp.com*
